name.en: English speech and presentation for technology

remark.en: Undergraduate course.Course level: intermediate.Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade.The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 中級課程。大學部課程。分發條件:(1)機械系學生優先選課。(2)第一次上課未出席，需事先跟 老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。(3)前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: The students will be able to 1. organize presentation materials effectively. 2. apply presentation skills and give effective presentations. 3. understand culture differences in the workplace 4. improve interpersonal communication skills.
goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能 1.整理研究資料並有條理的組織科技相關的演說內容； 2.應用英語簡報技巧，流暢且得體的以英語進行科技演講與簡報; 3.了解多元演說素材及科技職場文化，順利結合所學與職場實境，並展現人文素養； 4.溝通與觀摩中，增強溝通能力，並拓展人際脈絡。

grading.en: 1. Attendance (10％): Classes are mandatory. For each class-hour absence 2 points will be deducted from the final grade. A medical leave requires proof of medical care. All other excused leaves also require proof. All students are expected to attend class on time. For each tardiness 1 point will be deducted. Absence of more than 5 class-hours will result in a failing grade for the course. Please be noted that students who miss the first class will not be allowed to take this course. 2. Weekly assignments and Class participation (20％): Students are expected to prepare for and participate in class activities. 3. Weekly Mini-talks (30％): Students will be required to do homework and prepare for a mini-talk every week. 4. Mid-term and Final Presentations (40％): There are two major speeches for this course, each accounting for 20％ of the final grade. Both presentations centers around the speaker‘s field of study.
